reviews.review_content: Excellent class, fascinating material (Shakespeare, Ben Jonson, Thomas Kyd, Christopher Marlowe); small seminar style discussion format with a passionate and learned instructor, and relative freedom to explore interesting topics in research paper.  Convenient evening time slot.  The Department should offer this and other focused Renaissance lit classes more regularly!

Want to put in a lot of effort and earn a grade that's insanely low? Then take this course! 
Workload:
a moderate amount of boring plays
